postPageDescription: Big fan of Tech, i try to improve daily, and share what i learn. Please find below some articles that I wrote on those subjects :

sicom.title: Engineering Degree on Signal, Image processing, Communication and Multimedia
sicom.description: Signal Image Communication Multimedia (SICOM) offers you a two years cursus, jointly performed by Phelma and Ense3, to prepare a high level engineer degree in both information System, Communication and Signal / Image / Multimedia. Students will receive an Engineer Degree from the Grenoble Institute of Technology, and a master degree.

glasgow.title: Exchange Semester in Erasmus Program in computer science and signal processing
glasgow.description: I took part in the Erasmus program in the University of Glasgow, Scotland, UK. I took courses in computer science and signal processing.
